verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> for <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and they were <S%H622>gathered<s%> at <S%H7755>Socoh<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongs to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7755>Socoh<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> in Ephes-dammim.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>gathered,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H424>Elah,<s%> and <S%H6186>drew<s%> up in <S%H4421>battle<s%> array to <S%H7122>encounter<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> while <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H2088>side,<s%> with the <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them.

Then a <S%H376>champion<s%> <S%H996><s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out from the <S%H4264>armies<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath,<s%> from <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> whose <S%H1363>height<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2239>span.<s%>

And [he had] a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H3553>helmet<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and he was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with scale-armor which <S%H4948>weighed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>
[He] also [had] <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4697>greaves<s%> on his <S%H7272>legs<s%> and a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H3591>javelin<s%> [slung] <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And the <S%H2671>shaft<s%> of his <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a weaver's <S%H4500>beam,<s%> and the <S%H3852>head<s%> of his <S%H2595>spear<s%> [weighed] <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%> his shield-carrier also <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H7121>shouted<s%> to the <S%H4634>ranks<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"Why<s%> do you <S%H3318>come<s%> out to <S%H6186>draw<s%> up in <S%H4421>battle<s%> array? Am I not the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> and you <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>? <S%H1262>Choose<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> for yourselves and let him <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to me.

<S%H518>"If<s%> he is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with me and <S%H5221>kill<s%> me, then we will <S%H1961>become<s%> your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him and <S%H5221>kill<s%> him, then you shall <S%H1961>become<s%> our <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> us."

Again the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>ranks<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>"

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> they were <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H673>Ephrathite<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> and he had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%> And Jesse was <S%H2204>old<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H935>advanced<s%> [in years] among <S%H376>men.<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>older<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%> And the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> were <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the first-born, and the <S%H4932>second<s%> to him <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H6996>youngest.<s%> Now the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%>
but <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and forth from <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H7462>tend<s%> his father's <S%H6629>flock<s%> at <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>forward<s%> <S%H7925>morning<s%> and <S%H6150>evening<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H3320>took<s%> his <S%H3320>stand.<s%>

Then <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> for your <S%H251>brothers<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7039>roasted<s%> <S%H7039>grain<s%> and <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3899>loaves,<s%> and <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H935>"Bring<s%> also <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2757>cuts<s%> of <S%H2461>cheese<s%> to the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of [their] <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H6485>look<s%> into the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> back <S%H6161>news<s%> of them.

"For <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and they and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H424>Elah,<s%> <S%H3898>fighting<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H5203>left<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> with a <S%H8104>keeper<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> [the supplies] and <S%H1980>went<s%> as <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him. And he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4570>circle<s%> of the <S%H4570>camp<s%> while the <S%H2428>army<s%> was <S%H3318>going<s%> out in <S%H4634>battle<s%> <S%H4634>array<s%> <S%H7321>shouting<s%> the <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H7321>cry.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6186>drew<s%> up in <S%H6186>battle<s%> array, <S%H4634>army<s%> <S%H7122>against<s%> <S%H4634>army.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5203>left<s%> his <S%H3627>baggage<s%> in the <S%H3027>care<s%> of the <S%H3627>baggage<s%> <S%H8104>keeper,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> to the <S%H4634>battle<s%> <S%H4634>line<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> in order to <S%H7592>greet<s%> <S%H7965><s%> his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

As he was <S%H1696>talking<s%> with them, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H376>champion,<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> from <S%H1661>Gath<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath,<s%> was <S%H5927>coming<s%> up from the <S%H4634>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [them].
When <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> they <S%H5127>fled<s%> from him and were <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H5927>coming<s%> up? <S%H3588>Surely<s%> he is <S%H5927>coming<s%> up to <S%H2778>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And it will be that the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6238>enrich<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5221>kills<s%> him with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> his father's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> who were <S%H5975>standing<s%> by him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> will be <S%H6213>done<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H5493>takes<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? For <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> that he should <S%H2778>taunt<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?"

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> him in accord with <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> it will be <S%H6213>done<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5221>kills<s%> him."

Now <S%H446>Eliab<s%> his <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H376>men;<s%> and Eliab's <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H1732>David<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> have you <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%>? And with <S%H4310>whom<s%> have you <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H2007>those<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H2087>insolence<s%> and the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for you have <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>"
But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%>? Was it not just a <S%H1697>question<s%>?"

Then he <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>away<s%> <S%H681><s%> from him to <S%H312>another<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H1697>thing;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>answered<s%> the <S%H1697>same<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> as <S%H7223>before.<s%>
When the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> were <S%H8085>heard,<s%> they <S%H5046>told<s%> [them] to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and he <S%H3947>sent<s%> for him.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Let <S%H408>no<s%> man's <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5307>fail<s%> on <S%H5921>account<s%> of him; your <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with him; for you are [but] a <S%H5271>youth<s%> while he has been a <S%H4421>warrior<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>"

But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> was <S%H7462>tending<s%> his father's <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> When a <S%H738>lion<s%> or a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> from the <S%H5739>flock,<s%>

I <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H310>after<s%> him and <S%H5221>attacked<s%> him, and <S%H5337>rescued<s%> [it] from his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and when he <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me, I <S%H2388>seized<s%> [him] by his <S%H2206>beard<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> him and <S%H4191>killed<s%> him.

"Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> will be like <S%H259>one<s%> of them, <S%H3588>since<s%> he has <S%H2778>taunted<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%> and from the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H1677>bear,<s%> He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>" And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> and may the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be with you."

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H4055>garments<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H6959>helmet<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and he <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with <S%H8302>armor.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H4055>armor<s%> and <S%H2974>tried<s%> to <S%H1980>walk,<s%> for he had not <S%H5254>tested<s%> [them.] So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H428>these,<s%> for I have not <S%H5254>tested<s%> [them]." And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> them <S%H4480>off.<s%> <S%H5921><s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4731>stick<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> for himself <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2512>smooth<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> from the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the shepherd's <S%H3627>bag<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had, even in [his] <S%H3219>pouch,<s%> and his <S%H9521>sling<s%> was in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he <S%H5066>approached<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>
Then the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> on and <S%H7126>approached<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> with the shield-bearer in <S%H6440>front<s%> of him.

When the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H5027>looked<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> he <S%H959>disdained<s%> him; for he was [but] a <S%H5288>youth,<s%> and <S%H132>ruddy,<s%> with a <S%H3303>handsome<s%> <S%H4758>appearance.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "Am I a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> that you <S%H935>come<s%> to me with <S%H4731>sticks<s%>?" And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> by his <S%H430>gods.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> to me, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> "You <S%H935>come<s%> to me with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2595>spear,<s%> and a <S%H3591>javelin,<s%> but I <S%H935>come<s%> to you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H2778>taunted.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5462>deliver<s%> you up into my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you <S%H5221>down<s%> and <S%H5493>remove<s%> your <S%H7218>head<s%> from you. Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H8025>drew<s%> it out of its <S%H8593>sheath<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> him, and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> with it.
